attributes.action: Make the Home Condition Report Mandatory as part of the HIP or Compensate Qualified and trainee Home Inspectors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Goverment to make the Home Condition Report Mandatory or totally abolish it. Qualified and trainee Home Inspectors have spent thousands of pounds and see nothing in return and are in heavy debt and in financial ruin due to the goverment insisting that if 80% of HCR's were not taken voluntarily they would be made compulsary. Or we ask the Goverment to compensate us
